name: Add to Cart
description: I want to add products to my shopping cart
So that I can purchase multiple items

steps.name: the user is on the e-kart homepage
the cart is empty
the user is on the e-kart homepage
the cart is empty
the user clicks "Add to Cart" for one product
the cart should display that product
the cart should contain 1 product
the total price should be correctly updated
the user is on the e-kart homepage
the cart is empty
the user clicks "Add to Cart" for "Smartphone"
the cart should display "Smartphone" with price $699.99
the cart should contain 1 product
the total price should be $699.99

the cart is empty
the user adds 3 products
the cart should contain 3 products
the total price should be correctly updated

the cart should display "Laptop" with price $1299.99
the cart should contain 1 product
the total price should be $1299.99

the cart is empty
the user clicks "Add to Cart" for "Headphones"
the cart should display "Headphones" with price $199.99
the cart should contain 1 product
the total price should be $199.99

name: Empty Cart Display
description: I want to see appropriate messages when my cart is empty
So that I understand the current state of my cart

the cart is empty
the cart should show "Your cart is empty"
the cart should be empty
the total price should be $0.00
